reviewText: Yugioh is one of my favorite shows.
Good condition! Really surprised that I got such a nice copy so many years after it became out of print!

It is difficult to find the series at stores. Amazon offers a great selection and at good prices.
My son collects the stories and has a great collection due to what we find on Amazon.
Always shipped on time and in excellent condition.

this was the first 3-part duel in yugioh and it really needed to be. the Para-Dox brothers aren't really clever enemies, but the way this duel works is pretty interesting, it basicly turn yugioh into a combo with D&D. this is one of the best duels in the duelest kingdom arc, the only one that are turely better is face off(yugi v. kaiba) and Best of friends, best of duelists( yugi v. joey). Overall i wish there could have been more of this style of dueling in yugioh but this is good enough.
This is such a exciting video. A two on two battle with Yugi and Joey teaming up together. Work through the riddles and find the path to the castle. Must Buy for any Yugi fan!
